A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Left a lot of things unanswered from the previous film Force Awakens\, also has many plot holes that the audience is just supposed to accept. The whole story of rose and Finn and the casino felt very outta place and slowed the pace of the film. We never got any explanation about who's Snoke was\, not the worst star wars but definitely not the best at all. I gave this a  1/2 star because it won't let me give 0 stars
